Content: Minister Ajith P. Perera says UNF Presidential Candidate Minister Sajith Premadasa will hold his inaugural campaign on 10 th of this month. The Minister made this comment addressing a press conference. The inaugural public rally of the UNF Presidential candidate will be held at the Galle Face on the 10 th . He also said that it will be the biggest public meeting in the history of Sri Lankan Politics with an expected participation of 500,000.
